title: Congresswoman Introduces Bill to Criminalize Deepfakes
description: Congresswoman Yvette D. Clarke gathered with an assortment of New York state and city officials in Washington, D.C. on Thursday to meet with Department of Justice officials and others about the NYPD's stop-and-frisk policy. (Courtesy of Congresswoman Yvette D. Clarke's office.)

title: FCC Commissioner Blasts Net Neutrality Revival Proposal as ‘Serious Mistake’
description: Brendan Carr, commissioner at the Federal Communications Commission, testifies during a House Energy and Commerce Committee Subcommittee hearing in Washington, on March 31, 2022. (Kevin Dietsch/Getty Images)

title: Australians More Wary of Scams: Research
description: A Visa credit card is seen on a computer keyboard in this picture illustration taken on Sept. 6, 2017. (Philippe Wojazer/Illustration/Reuters)

title: Why Refusing a SMART Meter Is Smart Thing to Do
description: A smart energy meter, used to monitor gas and electricity use, is pictured in a home in Walthamstow, east London, on Feb. 4, 2022. (Tolga Akmen/AFP via Getty Images)
